mapper.select: select id, processId, subId, makeId, sampleIndex, sampleName, dateAccount, datePassword, datePath, sequencingplatform, remarks, currentStatu, createTime, creater, rowIndex, updateTime, updateUser, superAccount, superPwd, superPath, lastTime, (select count(1) from cibr_task_process_analysis bio where bio.dismountId = dis.id) as bioNum from cibr_task_process_dismountdata dis where processId = '${processId}' and currentStatu = '${currentStatu}' order by bioNum desc;

select confirm.id as confirmId, make.sequencingPlatform as sequencingPlatform from cibr_task_process_confirm confirm left join cibr_task_process_library lib on confirm.libId = lib.id left join cibr_task_process_samplemake make on lib.makeId = make.id where confirm.id in
#{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
